Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.connection.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Server extends Object implements RemoteServer
Server class used to manage the games and the clients

Matteo Leonardo Luraghi

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start() throws IOException, IPNotFoundException
      Start the server by exposing itself in the RMI registry, opening the server socket and starting accepting socket connections
      Throws:
      IOException - if the socket initialization fails
      IPNotFoundException - if unable to find the server's ip

      Parameters:

      Parameters:
